  10% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(var(--fa-bounce-start-scale-x, 1.1), var(--fa-bounce-start-scale-y, 0.9)) translateY(0);

  }

  50% {
    -webkit-transform: scale(var(--fa-bounce-land-scale-x, 1.05), var(--fa-bounce-land-scale-y, 0.95)) translateY(0);

.fa-rotate-by {
  -webkit-transform: rotate(var(--fa-rotate-angle, none));
          transform: rotate(var(--fa-rotate-angle, none));
}

.fa-stack {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  height: 2em;
  position: relative;
  width: 2.5em;
}

.fa-stack-1x,
.fa-stack-2x {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  margin: auto;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  z-index: var(--fa-stack-z-index, auto);
}

.svg-inline--fa.fa-stack-1x {
  height: 1em;
  width: 1.25em;
}
.svg-inline--fa.fa-stack-2x {
  height: 2em;
  width: 2.5em;
}

.fa-inverse {
  color: var(--fa-inverse, #fff);
}

.sr-only,
.fa-sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border-width: 0;
}

.sr-only-focusable:not(:focus),
.fa-sr-only-focusable:not(:focus) {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border-width: 0;
}

.svg-inline--fa .fa-primary {
  fill: var(--fa-primary-color, currentColor);
  opacity: var(--fa-primary-opacity, 1);
}

.svg-inline--fa .fa-secondary {
  fill: var(--fa-secondary-color, currentColor);
  opacity: var(--fa-secondary-opacity, 0.4);
}

.svg-inline--fa.fa-swap-opacity .fa-primary {
  opacity: var(--fa-secondary-opacity, 0.4);
}

.svg-inline--fa.fa-swap-opacity .fa-secondary {
  opacity: var(--fa-primary-opacity, 1);
}

.svg-inline--fa mask .fa-primary,
.svg-inline--fa mask .fa-secondary {
  fill: black;
}

.fad.fa-inverse,
.fa-duotone.fa-inverse {
  color: var(--fa-inverse, #fff);

                    #onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-policy-text,
                    #onetrust-consent-sdk .ot-b-addl-desc,
                    #onetrust-consent-sdk .ot-dpd-desc,

	</a></div></div></div></div></div> <!----></div></div></article></section> <div data-fetch-key="BlockFeatures:0" data-v-66917a68=""><section data-type="single" class="page-section featured page-section--background"><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> <div class="featured-block featured-block--home"><div class="featured-block__window"><div class="featured-block__content"><h2 class="featured-block__title">恢弘壮阔的战役</h2> <!----> <div class="featured-block__slot"><p data-v-2c67cd2a="" class="feature-block__content">
	使用摄影测量法捕捉众多现实世界地点，重现生动逼真的沉浸式环境；多个潜入和撤离点以及暗杀名单上的目标，可针对每项任务提供全新的视角。独自或与搭档合作对抗纳粹的阴谋，改进后的合作机制允许分享弹药和物品、下达命令以及互相治疗。
</p> <!----></div></div> <!----> <img src="/_nuxt/image/219d58.webp" width="720" height="400" alt="Expansive Campaign" loading="lazy" class="featured-block__media" style="object-fit:contain;object-position:center;width:100%;height:fit-content"></div></div> </article></section><section data-type="single" class="page-section featured page-section--background"><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> <div class="featured-block featured-block--home"><div class="featured-block__window"><div class="featured-block__content"><h2 class="featured-block__title">先进的射击物理特性和遍历系统</h2> <!----> <div class="featured-block__slot"><p data-v-2c67cd2a="" class="feature-block__content">
	使用滑索滑下斜坡，沿窗台摆动以到达理想的有利位置，或者偷偷溜过目光敏锐的监视哨。瞄准目标时，要将步枪枪托和枪管选项以及重力、风速和心率等因素考虑在内。
</p> <!----></div></div> <!----> <img src="/_nuxt/image/5cf1fa.webp" width="720" height="400" alt="Advanced Gunplay Physics And Traversal" loading="lazy" class="featured-block__media" style="object-fit:contain;object-position:center;width:100%;height:fit-content"></div></div> </article></section><section data-type="single" class="page-section featured page-section--background"><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> <div class="featured-block featured-block--home"><div class="featured-block__window"><div class="featured-block__content"><h2 class="featured-block__title">高水准的自定义</h2> <!----> <div class="featured-block__slot"><p data-v-2c67cd2a="" class="feature-block__content">
	使用工作台自定义并全面升级你的武器：更换瞄准镜、枪托、枪管、弹匣等。步枪、辅助武器和手枪都拥有众多选项。除此以外，你还可以根据目标选择适合的弹药，包括穿甲弹和非致命弹药等。
</p> <!----></div></div> <!----> <img src="/_nuxt/image/9689c5.webp" width="720" height="400" alt="High Calibre Customization" loading="lazy" class="featured-block__media" style="object-fit:contain;object-position:center;width:100%;height:fit-content"></div></div> </article></section><section data-type="single" class="page-section featured page-section--background"><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> <div class="featured-block featured-block--home"><div class="featured-block__window"><div class="featured-block__content"><h2 class="featured-block__title">入侵模式——PvP和合作模式下的战役降临</h2> <!----> <div class="featured-block__slot"><p data-v-2c67cd2a="" class="feature-block__content">
	以轴心国狙击手的身份入侵其他玩家的战役，参与一场致命的猫捉老鼠游戏，为跟踪猎物时面临的挑战增添新的维度。或者你可以扮演卡尔，然后寻求帮助，让第二名狙击手帮你摆脱困境。
</p> <!----></div></div> <!----> <img src="/_nuxt/image/b2161f.webp" width="720" height="400" alt="Invasion Mode Drop-In PVP" loading="lazy" class="featured-block__media" style="object-fit:contain;object-position:center;width:100%;height:fit-content"></div></div> </article></section><section data-type="single" class="page-section featured page-section--background"><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> <div class="featured-block featured-block--home"><div class="featured-block__window"><div class="featured-block__content"><h2 class="featured-block__title">紧张刺激的对抗性多人游戏</h2> <!----> <div class="featured-block__slot"><p data-v-2c67cd2a="" class="feature-block__content">
	自定义你的角色和装备，然后参加真正考验射击技巧的16场玩家战斗，在激烈的竞争中赚取经验值、奖章和缎带。如果你更喜欢合作，你可以在生存模式中，与最多3名其他玩家组队，抵抗一波又一波的敌人。
</p> <!----></div></div> <!----> <img src="/_nuxt/image/5945c1.webp" width="720" height="400" alt="Tense Adversarial Multiplayer" loading="lazy" class="featured-block__media" style="object-fit:contain;object-position:center;width:100%;height:fit-content"></div></div> </article></section><section data-type="single" class="page-section featured page-section--background"><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> <div class="featured-block featured-block--home"><div class="featured-block__window"><div class="featured-block__content"><h2 class="featured-block__title">效果增强的击杀镜头</h2> <!----> <div class="featured-block__slot"><p data-v-2c67cd2a="" class="feature-block__content">
	使用工作台自定义并全面升级你的武器：更换瞄准镜、枪托、枪管、弹匣等。步枪、辅助武器和手枪都拥有众多选项。除此以外，你还可以根据目标选择适合的弹药，包括穿甲弹和非致命弹药等。
</p> <!----></div></div> <!----> <img src="/_nuxt/image/7fb64e.webp" width="720" height="400" alt="Enhanced Kill Cam" loading="lazy" class="featured-block__media" style="object-fit:contain;object-position:center;width:100%;height:fit-content"></div></div> </article></section></div> <section data-type="single" data-fetch-key="BlockInformation:1" class="page-section" data-v-66917a68=""><article class="page-section__primary"><!----> <!----> <!----> </article></section> <section data-type="single" id="media-section" data-fetch-key="BlockMediaCarousel:0" class="page-section page-section--background" data-v-66917a68=""><article class="page-section__primary"><h2 class="page-section__heading">

This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalised web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
